routeRandomSigma.description: the randomization sigma of edge weigths

explorationPercentage.description: the percentage of routes we want to use for exploration

maxSpeedAndLengthFactor.description: how much the length/speed influences the routing

averageEdgeDurationFactor.description: how much the averageEdgeFactor influences the routing

freshnessUpdateFactor.description: how much the freshnessUpdateFactor influences the routing

freshnessCutOffValue.description: if data is older than this we do not consider it in the algorithm

reRouteEveryTicks.description: check for a new route very x times after the car starts
